enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before converting AST declarations to Core declarations.
The resolve method is used to resolve the AST declaration before converting it to Core, ensuring all dependencies are met.
Both toCore(Ast.Decl) and toCore(Ast.ValDecl) convert AST declarations to Core, making them suitable for similar assertions.
Both toCore(Ast.Decl) and toCore(Ast.DatatypeDecl) convert AST declarations to Core, making them suitable for similar assertions.
